txt.en: 'The mathom house is the pride of Michel Delving all manner of curio can be found there.'
'Some of the finest produce and pipeweed is grown in the fields south of town.'
'I once travelled all the way up to Needlehole. It's a strange place, seems like there's as many dwarves as hobbits.'
'The Bird and Baby's just the place to quench your thirst with a nice beer.'
